titles.title: Helping End Lifetime Penalties Act of 2022
Helping End Lifetime Penalties Act of 2022
To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to limit certain late enrollment penalties under the Medicare program.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

bill.summary:
Helping End Lifetime Penalties Act of 2022
This bill limits certain Medicare late enrollment penalties to 12 months (rather than for the lifetime of coverage).
